cards.name: Alms
cards.description: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to $4.

cards.name: Borrow
cards.description: Once per turn: +1 Buy. If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +$1.

cards.name: Quest
cards.description: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Save
cards.description: Once per turn: +1 Buy. Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

cards.name: Scouting Party
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 and put the rest back in any order.

cards.name: Travelling Fair
cards.description:
+2 Buys
When you gain a card this turn, you may put it onto your deck.

cards.name: Bonfire
cards.description: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

cards.name: Expedition
cards.description: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

cards.name: Ferry
cards.description: Move your -$2 cost token to an Action Supply pile. (Cards from that pile cost $2 less on your turns, but not less than $0.)

cards.name: Plan
cards.description: Move your Trashing token to an Action Supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

cards.name: Mission
cards.description: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, during which you can't buy cards.

cards.name: Pilgrimage
cards.description: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

cards.name: Ball
cards.description: Take your -$1 token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to $4.

cards.name: Raid
cards.description: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts their -1 Card token on their deck.

cards.name: Seaway
cards.description: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy.)

cards.name: Trade
cards.description: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.

cards.name: Lost Arts
cards.description: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action.)

cards.name: Training
cards.description: Move your +$1 token to an Action Supply pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +$1.)

cards.name: Inheritance
cards.description: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to $4. Move your Estate token to it. (Your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card.)

cards.name: Pathfinding
cards.description: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card.)

cards.name: Coin of the Realm
cards.description:
Worth $1
When you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.
----------
Directly after you finish playing an Action card, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

cards.name: Page
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

cards.name: Peasant
cards.description:
+1 Buy
+$1
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

cards.name: Ratcatcher
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Raze
cards.description:
+1 Action
Trash this or a card from your hand. Look at one card from your deck per $1 the trashed card costs. Put one of them into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Amulet
cards.description: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +$1; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

cards.name: Caravan Guard
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +$1.
----------
When another player plays an Attack card, you may first play this from your hand.
(+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

cards.name: Dungeon
cards.description:
+1 Action
Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards

cards.name: Gear
cards.description:
+2 Cards
Set aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down (under this). At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

cards.name: Guide
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
When you gain a card costing up to $6, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

cards.name: Magpie
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

cards.name: Messenger
cards.description:
+1 Buy
+$2
You may put your deck into your discard pile.
----------
When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to $4, and each other player gains a copy of it.

cards.name: Miser
cards.description: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +$1 per Copper on your Tavern mat.

cards.name: Port
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
----------
When you buy this, gain another Port.

cards.name: Ranger
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). Then if it's face up, +5 Cards.

cards.name: Transmogrify
cards.description:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, and gain a card costing up to $1 more than it into your hand.

cards.name: Artificer
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly $1 per card discarded, onto your deck.

cards.name: Bridge Troll
cards.description:
Each other player takes their -$1 token.
Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Buy.
----------
While this is in play, cards cost $1 less on your turns, but not less than $0.

cards.name: Distant Lands
cards.description:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
Worth 4VP if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0VP).

cards.name: Giant
cards.description: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). Then if it's face down, +$1. If it's face up, +$5, and each other player reveals the top card of their deck, trashes it if it costs from $3 to $6, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

cards.name: Haunted Woods
cards.description:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, they put their hand onto their deck in any order.
At the start of your next turn, +3 Cards.

cards.name: Lost City
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
----------
When you gain this, each other player draws a card.

cards.name: Relic
cards.description:
Worth $2
When you play this, each other player puts their -1 Card token on their deck.

cards.name: Royal Carriage
cards.description:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
Directly after you finish playing an Action card, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

cards.name: Storyteller
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$1
Play up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Then pay all of your $ (including the $1 from this) and draw a card per $1 you paid.

cards.name: Swamp Hag
cards.description:
Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, they gain a Curse.
At the start of your next turn, +$3.

cards.name: Treasure Trove
cards.description:
Worth $2
When you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

cards.name: Wine Merchant
cards.description:
+$4
+1 Buy
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least $2 unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.

cards.name: Hireling
cards.description:
At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game: +1 Card.
(This stays in play.)

cards.name: Treasure Hunter
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$1
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained on their last turn.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Warrior
cards.description:
+2 Cards
For each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of their deck and trashes it if it costs $3 or $4.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Hero
cards.description:
+$2
Gain a Treasure.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Champion
cards.description:
+1 Action
For the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.
(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Soldier
cards.description:
+$2
+$1 per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Fugitive
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Discard a card.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Disciple
cards.description:
You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.
----------
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Teacher
cards.description:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
----------
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +$1 token to an Action Supply pile you have no tokens on. (When you play a card from that pile, you first get that bonus.)
(This is not in the Supply.)
